name: 昆顿·米勒
awards: 2025年 第75届柏林国际电影节 主竞赛单元 最佳短片 (提名) 再会科基
2025年 第75届柏林国际电影节 银熊奖 短片Cupra电影人奖 再会科基
introduction: Born in Australia in 1981, the filmmaker and artist has been based in the Netherlands since 2012. His focus on film developed out of video installations and from writing and designing for literary publications. He often makes comedies which depict alienated characters struggling with language, truth, time and history. Diverse experiences of language are a strong feature of his films. “Although his work may seem ironic at times,” one reviewer wrote, “it is characterised by a romanticism and razor-sharp lightness.”
